mapper.select: select id, electricity_cabinet_id, core_sha256_value, sub_sha256_value, core_name, sub_name, create_time, update_time, file_type from t_ele_ota_file where id = #{id}
select id, electricity_cabinet_id, core_sha256_value, sub_sha256_value, core_name, sub_name,create_time, update_time, file_type from t_ele_ota_file limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_ele_ota_file(electricity_cabinet_id, core_sha256_value, sub_sha256_value, core_name, sub_name, create_time, update_time, file_type) values (#{electricityCabinetId}, #{coreSha256Value}, #{subSha256Value}, #{coreName}, #{subName}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{fileType})
mapper.update:
update t_ele_ota_file
electricity_cabinet_id = #{electricityCabinetId},
core_sha256_value = #{coreSha256Value},
sub_sha256_value = #{subSha256Value},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
core_name = #{coreName},
sub_name = #{subName},
file_type = #{fileType},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, electricity_cabinet_id, core_sha256_value, sub_sha256_value, core_name, sub_name, create_time, update_time, file_type from t_ele_ota_file where electricity_cabinet_id = #{eid}
